content: from time to time i have a crochet phase and sometimes a pattern emerges from there this hat features a pattern that is kind of a one-color interlocking crochet the result is a textured fabric that reminds me of a patch of pebbles do not fear it is easier to work than it sounds - and the pattern features pictures to help with pebbles stitch this hat comes in three newborn sizes and is worked top-down a perfect way to use up sock yarn left-overs please check with your chosen nicu about their needs before donating preemie/newborn/baby to fit head circumference 30-32 5 33-35 / 35-37 5 cm / 11 ¾ -12 ¾ 13 - 13 ¾ / 13 ⅜-14 ¾ inch in the spirit of charity this pattern is available for free if you would like to thank me consider purchasing one of my other designs for yourself or for a friend or buy me a ko-fi 1 > \#pebbleshat #stefaniebolddesign this design is also available at lovecrafts 2 follow me on instagram @stefaniebold 3 1 https //ko-fi com/stefaniebold 2 https //www lovecrafts com/de-de/search q=stefanie%20bold 3 https //www instagram com/stefaniebold/
